commit.message:
chore: Convert to Yarn (#4978)

* Run yarn import to generate yarn.lock

* Drop package-lock.json

* Replace references to npm with yarn

* Convert xtermjs workspace to Yarn

* Ignore all node_modules directories from git

* Convert desktop workspace to Yarn

* Update workspaces to use Yarn

* Install yarn in desktop workspace image

* Ensure pre/post-install scripts error if a command does

* Run yarn import in prairielib

* Drop package-lock.json from prairielib

* Run yarn import in grader_host

* Drop package-lock.json from grader_host

* Drop one-off comment from tests/testGroupStudent.js

* Drop unnecessary .gitignore files

* Drop references to v1 from .gitignore

* Dedupe root packages

* Ensure yarn.lock is copied into the Docker image

* Run yarn-deduplicate in grader_host

* Run yarn-deduplicate in prairielib

* Use Debian 10 instead of 9

* Drop package.json and yarn.lock from prairielib directory

* Install winston-aws-cloudwatch at project root

* Drop package.json and yarn.lock from grader_host directory

* Install s3-streamlogger dependency

* Fix root Dockerfile

* Ensure image-building scripts fail if subcommands do

* Install Jest in root package.json

* Add Make targets for additional tests

* Drop Makefiles from grader_host and prairielib

* Fix execution of tests + linting
